thoughts.text: Since the get_hyperlinks command returned an error, I will try using the browse_website command to extract the job postings.
thoughts.reasoning: Using the browse_website command to extract the job postings will increase the chances of finding relevant job postings.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the browse_website command to extract the job postings
- Filter out irrelevant job postings
- Prioritize job postings that are most likely to be a good fit based on experience and desired work environment
thoughts.criticism: I need to ensure that I am filtering out irrelevant job postings effectively to save on short term memory usage.
thoughts.speak: I will use the browse_website command to extract the job postings, filter out irrelevant job postings, and prioritize job postings that are most likely to be a good fit based on experience and desired work environment.
